pkgmetadata.longdescription: # nxs-analysis-tools## Overviewnxs-analysis-tools provides a suite of tools for slicing (2D), cutting (1D), and transforming (e.g., symmetrizing, interpolating, deltaPDF) nexus format (.nxs) scattering data.View the documentation [here](https://nxs-analysis-tools.readthedocs.io/en/stable/).## InstallationInstall nxs-analysis-tools with ``pip``:```{code-block} consolepip install nxs-analysis-tools```## LicenseThis project is licensed under the MIT License.
